actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to amend the Migratory Bird Treaty Act to guarantee a trial by jury for any person charged with a violation of the provisions of that act.

summary.text: Grants a trial by jury to any person charged with a violation of the provisions of the Migratory Bird Treaty Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Migratory Bird Treaty Act to guarantee a trial by jury for any person charged with a violation of the provisions of that act.
